member.name: P:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.FSConn
member.summary: Gets or set the connection string pointing to the Odyssey FileStream-enabled SQL Server

member.name: P:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.RConn
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string pointing to the Research Database

member.name: P:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.logPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the full file path to the log file in which to log errors encountered during procedures

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.getFTPPaths(System.String,System.String,System.String,ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.ftpSearchFor,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Searches recursively through the remote path for files modified since lastWriteFrom
member.param: The full path to the remote directory (e.g. 192.168.0.80/img16/prism/images/2013
The username used to access the remote ftp server
The password used to access the remote ftp server
Use AllDirectories to search recursively and nondiscriminantly through all subdirectories; Use PFolderDirectories to obtain only those directories of the form PX, where X is 1 or more numeric digits
The date after which directories and files were modified; specify 'Nothing' to retrieve everything
member.returns: Returns an array of full remote paths to files

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.doTelnet(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Executes a series of commands within a telnet session
member.param: A list of the commands to execute (e.g. mkdir /usr/prism/test_directory)
The IP address of the machine hosting the telnet session (i.e. the machine to connect to)

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.updateBinary(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Modifies the binary data of a byte array (intended file type: Picker Odyssey)
member.param: The byte array containing the binary data
The decimal-based starting position at which to start replacing data
The string replacement value
The total length of the number of bytes to replace. Unused space is right-padded with 0 values
Whether the new data should be formatted as an Odyssey date
member.returns: A byte array containing the updated data
member.remarks: This method does NOT modify the size of the original array. An error is thrown if the length of the replacement string is larger than the total_length parameter.

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.parseOdysseyData(System.String)
member.summary: Parses Odyssey data into a FileStream-enabled SQL Database
member.param: Full path location of the Odyssey data to parse
member.returns: Returns a status message of the operation (e.g. Data parsed into SPECT_Data)

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.odysseyToROI(System.Int64,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts an Odyssey file in SPECT_Data (FileStream database) to an ROI .csv report
member.param: Data_ID corresponding to the Odyssey file (see remarks)
The full path to the remote Odyssey directory (e.g. 192.168.0.80/usr/ResearchOFiles) (see remarks)
The username for the remote ftp server (for Odyssey, this is the root account)
The password the remote ftp server (for Odyssey, this is the default root password)
Directory to store the converted interfile
Directory to store the converted analyze image pair (.hdr and .img)
Directory to store the atlas and cluster files
Directory to store the final report file
Directory to store the manifest files
member.returns: An array containing paths to (in order): interfile, analyze header, analyze image, report file

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.parseROI(System.String)
member.summary: Parses an ROI report file into the research database
member.param: The full path to the .csv report file
member.returns: A string message containing the status of the operation

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.parseReadings(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a SPECT reading document into the research database
member.param: The full path to an Excel SPECT reading document
member.returns: An integer representing: the operation failed (0), the reading was parsed but not matched (1), or the reading was parsed and matched (2)

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.getFileBinary(System.String)
member.summary: Obtains a byte array of the file contents of a file
member.param: The full path to the file

member.name: M:ACI_Common_Functions.ACICommonFunctions.getSHA1Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Generates an SHA1 checksum string for a file
member.param: The full path to the file
member.returns: A 40 character message digest (checksum) in hexadecimal format
